content: it down in detail below you can see how the sts follow between the two stitch markers round 1 make two increases round 2 k1 p2 … p2 k1 round 3 make two increses round 4 k2 p2 p2 k2 here you have 4 k sts next to each other on both sides round 5 make two increses round 6 p1 k2 k2 p1 round 7 make two increses round 8 p2 k2 k2 p2 round 9 make two increses round 10 k1 p2 p2 k1 round 11 make two increses round 12 k2 p2 … p2 k2 here you have 4 k sts next to each other on both sides round 13 make two increses round 14 p1 k2 k2 p1 round 15 make two increses round 16 p2 k2 k2 p2 round 17 make two increses round 18 k1 p2 p2 k1 round 19 make two increses round 20 k2 p2 p2 k2 here you have 4 k sts next to each other on both sides round 21 make two increses round 22 p1 k2 k2 p1 round 21 make two increses work until the end of the round there should be 30 sts between the two markers the heel increase is complete -4- remove the markers find the center of the heel and mark the middle 10 sts with the markers you are at the beginning of the round work until 1 st remains before the second marker from here you work with short row this is the first one row 1 rs ssk with the last st before the marker and the first st after the marker remove the marker turn your work row 2 ws sl the first st work until 1 st remains before the first marker p2 tg remove the marker turn your work row 3 rs sl the first st work until 1 st remains before the gap ssk turn your work row 4 ws sl the first st work until 1 st remains before the gap p2 tg turn your work repeat row 3-4 you always knit an ssk on the right side and p2 tg on the wrong side continue to decrease until you have 8 sts on each side + 10 sts in the middle need more help → https //youtu be/xgflj7zvxum rs work until 1 st remains before the second gap ssk p1 turn your work ws sl the first st and make a double st work until 1 st remains before the gap p2 tg k1 turn your work rs sl 1 and make a double st work until the other double st and p2tg tbl from now on you re working in the round again complete this round you have already purled together one double st you have one more double st to purl together in the next round the first one was purled together through the back loop purl this one normally together need more help → https //youtu be/klzickul0he -5- you have 24 sts
